version_description: Bug fix related to Espacejeux account deposit feature.

- New product : La Quotidienne 2
- Return of Lotto Hockey
- Return of Roue de Fortune Éclair (activation on March 14th, 2016)

-Registration process upgrade.
-Minor bug fixes.

- New Lotto Poker Plus
- Minor Bug fixes
- Return of La Poule aux oeufs d'or express (activation on July 25, 2016).
Bug fix

· THE NEW LOTO DE L’ÉTÉ. Up for grabs: 4,491 prizes including 2 guaranteed prizes of $1 M as well as merchandise prizes. Draw on August 16.
· More new games: try the four online scratch tickets, including Gagnant à vie!, now available in the app
· Improved navigation in the Results section allows you to see all the latests results at a glance
· New, clean and simple look

New features in this version
Lotto Max will be undergoing several changes, namely:
- The Maximum jackpot will increase to $70 million from the current $60 million.
- Draws will be conducted twice a week: every Tuesday and Friday.
- Each selection will consist of seven numbers from 1 to 50.
